contents.text: Welcome to Woopra, the San Francisco-based customer analytics platform.
To learn more about our product features and pricing, press '1'.
To schedule a personalized demo, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our Sales team to arrange your demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized Woopra demo
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of your analytics platform to see how it can track my veteran service organization’s outreach efforts.
I'd like to schedule a personalized demo to explore Woopra's API integration and real-time analytics features.
I’d like to schedule a one-on-one demo to walk me through the platform features.
Schedule a product demo to evaluate Woopra’s analytics for my physics research.

contents.text: For pricing, billing, or account setup inquiries, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our Billing department.

navigationGoals: Get details on Woopra pricing and billing
I need to set up an account and get details on subscription pricing for monitoring our veteran fundraising campaigns.
I need to discuss enterprise volume-based pricing tiers and set up consolidated billing for our account.
I need help reviewing my bill and updating my payment information.
Get information on student pricing, billing options, and account setup.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue in Woopra
I’m experiencing integration issues with your SDK on my nonprofit’s site that tracks veteran support requests—I need technical assistance.
I'm experiencing missing event data in my API ingestion pipeline and need technical support to troubleshoot.
I’m having trouble logging in and need technical assistance.
Troubleshoot an error preventing my experiment data from displaying in the dashboard.

contents.text: For Professional Services and implementation assistance, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our Professional Services team.

navigationGoals: Arrange professional services for Woopra implementation
I want professional services help to implement advanced event tracking for my veteran wellness program.
I'd like professional services assistance to configure custom dashboards and set up data connectors for our marketing stack.
I need guidance on setting up and customizing the analytics for my website.
Discuss customization and integration of Woopra with our lab’s data systems.
